document_data.mainbody:
ahllavur-fern was a species of plant found abundantly growing across the Eastern and Western Heartlands, favored for use in personal hygiene.
Yahllavur-fern leaves were among several others used to clean off ones posterior following nightsoil egestion. Comparatively to other plants used for the same purpose, yahllavur-fern had smaller leaves but was significantly more common.
